summary: This is an email from a Correctional Service Administrator at the Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office, dated August 12, 2019, forwarding documentation and apologizing for not including the recipient on an earlier email. The email includes attachments related to SHU (Special Housing Unit) reports and a locator.

persons.name: Correctional Service Administrator
persons.role: Correctional Service Administrator at Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office
persons.context: Sender of the email forwarding documentation and apologizing for not including the recipient on an earlier email.

events.title: Email Forwarding SHU Documentation
events.description: A Correctional Service Administrator at the Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office sends an email forwarding documentation including SHU reports and a locator, and apologizes for not including the recipient on an earlier email.

locations: Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office
keyFacts: The email is dated August 12, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The email forwards attachments including 'SHU_REPORT_8-8-19.pdf' and 'SHU_LOCATOR.pdf', suggesting documentation related to Special Housing Unit activities from August 8, 2019.
The sender is a Correctional Service Administrator at the Federal Bureau of Prisons Northeast Regional Office, indicating official prison system communication.
The email includes an apology for not including the recipient on an earlier email, suggesting possible internal coordination or oversight issues.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, indicating its relevance to post-death investigations or administrative reviews.
